id,
paytimecalc,
lineupnumber,

mapper.update:
update lineup
paytimecalc = #{paytimecalc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lineupnumber = #{lineupnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lineupmoney = #{lineupmoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
lineuptime = #{lineuptime,jdbcType=DATE},
flag = #{flag,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update lineup set paytimecalc = #{paytimecalc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lineupnumber = #{lineupnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lineupmoney = #{lineupmoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, lineuptime = #{lineuptime,jdbcType=DATE}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
